MINT.description: Mint items are in essentially new original condition but have been opened or played.

NEAR MINT.description: Excellent items are almost entirely free from blemishes and other visual defects and have been played or used with the utmost care.

EXCELLENT+.description: Excellent items are almost entirely free from blemishes and other visual defects and have been played or used with the utmost care.

EXCELLENT.description: Excellent items are almost entirely free from blemishes and other visual defects and have been played or used with the utmost care.

VERY GOOD+.description: Very Good items may show a few slight marks or scratches but are fully functional and in overall great shape.

VERY GOOD.description: Very Good items may show a few slight marks or scratches but are fully functional and in overall great shape.

GOOD+.description: Good condition items function properly but may exhibit some wear and tear.

GOOD.description: Good condition items function properly but may exhibit some wear and tear.

FAIR.description: Fair condition gear should function but will show noticeable cosmetic damage or other issues.

POOR.description: Poor condition gear may not work properly but can still perform most functions.

reverb_conditions.description: Brand New items are sold by an authorized dealer or original builder and include all original packaging.
Mint items are in essentially new original condition but have been opened or played.
Excellent items are almost entirely free from blemishes and other visual defects and have been played or used with the utmost care.
Very Good items may show a few slight marks or scratches but are fully functional and in overall great shape.
Good condition items function properly but may exhibit some wear and tear.
Fair condition gear should function but will show noticeable cosmetic damage or other issues.
Poor condition gear may not work properly but can still perform most functions.
Non Functioning items do not work as they should. All known issues should be described in the listing description.
